pagename: Money making guide/Killing the Crazy archaeologist
title: Killing the Crazy archaeologist

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 27 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

content:
The methods in this guide may involve considerable risk, including (but not limited to): loss of money/items, unstable prices, and/or slow GE resale.
Reason: This method is located in the Wilderness
Killing the crazy archaeologist
Requirements
Skills
50+ , for Iban's staff (u) (75+ recommended for powered staves)
40+ (Protect from Missiles)
Items
  • 3-iteming Magic gear
  • Amulet of glory
  • Games necklace
  • 3-4 Prayer potions
  • 1-2 Super energy or Stamina potions (optional)
  • Runes to cast Iban Blast if using Iban's staff
  • Rest lobsters or better
Quest
Underground Pass (for Iban's staff—optional)
Other
None
Results
ProfitExperience gained
343,622 30,375 10,125
Inputs (206,732)Outputs (550,354)
4 × Prayer potion(4) (40,060)1 × Stamina potion(4) (5,872)150 × Lobster (25,800)135,000 × Coins (135,000) Approximate cost of runes1.48 × Amulet of power (2,998)0.84 × Red d'hide body (5,196)8.44 × Rune knife (3,206)1.69 × Rune crossbow (16,548)14.77 × Mud rune (2,215)15.82 × Dragon arrow (28,761)6.75 × Grimy dwarf weed (7,425)6.75 × Anchovy pizza (4,151)1.69 × Prayer potion(4) (16,900)50.63 × Silver ore (2,532)4.22 × Uncut sapphire (1,531)6.33 × Uncut emerald (3,607)127 × Cannonball (25,566)0.84 × Muddy key (2,592)10.55 × Red dragonhide (28,287)12.66 × White berries (3,823)10.13 × Onyx bolt tips (83,734)0.21 × Fedora (1,775)0.11 × Odium shard 2 (195,813)0.11 × Malediction shard 2 (113,694)

The profit rate assumes 27 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

As the Crazy archaeologist is located in the Wilderness with the strong possibility of player killers appearing, only take a few expensive items. If Desert Treasure is completed, the fastest way to reach him is via the Dareeyak Teleport spell, or its corresponding tablet to teleport directly to the ruins. Alternatively using a Burning Amulet to teleport to the Bandit Camp, and running north-west to the ruins is a viable option for those without Desert Treasure completion. If you wish to take a detour, as to avoid player killers, you can teleport to the Corporeal Beast's lair via a games necklace, exit, and then run a bit south-east to the Wilderness Obelisk. Keep using the obelisk until you finally reach level 27 Wilderness where you'll run south-west towards the Western Ruins in circa level 22-24 Wilderness. Although he is within the teleport range in the Wilderness (up to level 30 Wilderness), you may get teleblocked.

It is also noteworthy, if using Iban Blast, to factor in the cost of Death Runes, as their price can significantly lower profits.

Nonetheless, the most effective way is to use Magic while activating Protect from Missiles and avoiding his special attack of explosive books. Get ready to run out of the area whenever he exclaims, "Rain of knowledge!" All in all, the Crazy archaeologist is a relatively simple boss, but a simple mistake can cause some damage to you with his special attack.

Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
